mapper.sql: id, menu_id, func_id, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.menu_name, t.menu_url, t.parent_id, t.type, t.menu_order, t2.id as func_id, t2.func_name, t2.func_order, t2.status, t2.func_url from qms_menu t LEFT JOIN qms_menu_func t1 ON t.id = t1.menu_id LEFT JOIN qms_func t2 ON t2.id = t1.func_id AND t2.status!=1 WHERE t.status != 1
and t.type != 2
and t.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
ORDER BY t.menu_order , t2.func_order
mapper.insert: insert into qms_menu_func (id, menu_id, func_id, create_user, create_date, update_user, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{funcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into qms_menu_func
id,
menu_id,
func_id,
create_user,
create_date,
update_user,
update_date,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{funcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update qms_menu_func
menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
func_id = #{funcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update qms_menu_func set menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, func_id = #{funcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
